sections.body: (1) This Act may be called the Cutchi Memons Act, 1938. (2) It shall come into force on the 1st day of November, 1938.

sections.section_title: Cutchi Memons to be governed in certain matters by Muslim Law
sections.body: Subject to the provisions of section 3, all Cutchi Memons shall, in matters of succession and inheritance, be governed by the Muslim Law.

Nothing in this Act shall affect any right or liability acquired or incurred before its commencement, or any legal proceeding or remedy in respect of any such right or liability; and any such legal proceeding or remedy may be continued or enforced as if this Act had not been passed.
